name: #Symmetry
description:
Welcome to "Symmetry: Space Tubers Edition".

The "Symmetry: Space Tubers Edition" is a new, free and addictive game for someone who is patient and wants to climbup on the LeaderBoard.

How to play:
Touch anywhere on the screen to fly. Avoid the planets or your character will explode and the game will be over!

Includes:
- 30 galaxies, 300 levels & more than 3.000 planet enemies.
- Free download (with in app purchase for removing ads).
- Teleport & Slow Motion actions.
- 44 Space Tubers Characters

Powered by WC Games:
http://wc-games.com

Developed by Automon:
http://automon.gr

Graphics by MadPixel:
http://madpixel.gr

Music by Popof Lab:
http://popoflab.com

Space Tubers Characters:
2J (George Ioannou), Jeremy, Kontopidis (+ John + Fanis + YouUp.gr), Manos, Lynx, Mikeius, Kostas Maliatsis, Cat Von K (Katia), Unboxholics (Sakis + Alekos), GRamers (Dimitris + Thodoros), Sxedio B (Zok), Booyah TV, Vana Papadopoulou, AmiYiamiTube (AnnaMaria Velli), Dimitris Dk' Kyrsanidis, HackyPixelz, Vibrator Productions, HellenicGaming, AntonisX007GR, Seniora Elis, Axel, i Mikri Ollandeza, Miss Madden, Kakos Xamos, GrMinecraftCousins (PatRinos + SapphireWolf), Noz, TheMegacyber69, Ioanna Samara, Artemis Samara, Anatoli Nizami, Toothfairy Gardy, RebellGamesGR, Dressing Room, Black Jo White, vintagejewel7.
